name: StickyJoe
description:
Sticky Joe is a Hero who shoots at enemies with a gum gun to catch them all.  Joe can easy fight for justice with the police since he makes the enemy immovable making it easy for the police to arrest them. 

Achievements Attempted:

Tango - Your team size is 2.

Controls:

A D - to move left and right

Space - to shoot

Space + W - to shoot upward

J - Special Gum Wave Shoot (Every 10secs)

K - Special Gum Bombs (Every 25secs)
